item.title: Need some good ideas off what too add to my server rep++
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

[quote=“Eclipse639, post:2, topic:424826”]A Bounty Master/System.

Basically here’s how it works, Every player would get say a book or just a stored interface that’s handled by the bounty master upon talking to them. Players can put bounty’s/rewards on a players head, If a user chooses to accept the challenge, they would get a ticket or something stating the user’s name they have accepted the bounty for. And if that user is killed by the player who accepted the bounty, they would recieve a ticket/receipt of some sort dropped by the player on the player’s death. Simply bring it back to the bounty master, and exchange it for the stored reward :3[/quote]
i may do something like this thanks for the post

Read full topic
item.source: Need some good ideas off what too add to my server rep++

item.title: Need some good ideas off what too add to my server rep++
item.dc:creator: @Eclipse639 Eclipse639
item.description:
@Eclipse639 wrote:

A Bounty Master/System.

Basically here’s how it works, Every player would get say a book or just a stored interface that’s handled by the bounty master upon talking to them. Players can put bounty’s/rewards on a players head, If a user chooses to accept the challenge, they would get a ticket or something stating the user’s name they have accepted the bounty for. And if that user is killed by the player who accepted the bounty, they would recieve a ticket/receipt of some sort dropped by the player on the player’s death. Simply bring it back to the bounty master, and exchange it for the stored reward :3

Read full topic
